name: Comedy Book
title: Three Men in a Boat
author: Jerome K. Jerome
description: A humorous story about three friends whose boating trip turns into a series of funny and memorable adventures.

name: Fiction Book
title: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland
author: Lewis Carroll
description: A fantasy tale of a young girl who enters a magical world full of strange creatures and imaginative surprises.

name: Horror Book
title: Dracula
author: Bram Stoker
description: A chilling gothic novel that tells the story of Count Dracula and his dark, terrifying influence.

name: Science Fiction Book
title: The Time Machine
author: H. G. Wells
description: A science fiction classic about time travel and a journey into the distant future of human civilization.

name: Mystery Book
title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
author: Arthur Conan Doyle
description: A collection of detective stories featuring Sherlock Holmes solving mysteries with sharp logic and observation.

name: Romance Book
title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A romantic novel exploring love, society, and misunderstandings through the relationship of Elizabeth Bennet and Mr. Darcy.

name: Classic Story Book
title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
author: Oscar Wilde
description: A philosophical story about vanity and morality, where a man remains young while his portrait bears the cost of his sins.

name: Adventure Book
title: Treasure Island
author: Robert Louis Stevenson
description: An exciting adventure of pirates, hidden treasure, and a thrilling sea journey.

name: Story Book
title: The Secret Garden
author: Frances Hodgson Burnett
description: A heartwarming story about a hidden garden that brings friendship, healing, and happiness into the lives of children.
